io.github.nixtabyte.telegram.jtelebot.request.factory

Class TelegramRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.nixtabyte.telegram.jtelebot.request.factory.TelegramRequestFactory

  • public final class TelegramRequestFactory
extends Object
    This class is a Factory of TelegramRequest objects it allows to easily create a request, for more information on the methods that the Telegram Bots api support please check See https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#available-methods
    Since:
    0.0.1

      • createGetMeRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createGetMeRequest()
        Creates a request to use the getMe method of the Telegram Bot api
        Returns:
        A TelegramRequest prepared to consume the getMe method
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest

      • createSendMessageRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createSendMessageRequest(long chatId,
                                       String text,
                                       boolean disableWebPagePreview,
                                       Long replyToMessageId,
                                       CustomReplyKeyboard customReplyKeyboard)
                                                throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException,
                                                       org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException,
                                                       IOException
        Creates a Telegram request ready to use to consume the sendMessage method of the Telegram bot api
        Parameters:
        chatId - Unique identifier for the message recipient — User or GroupChat id
        text - Text of the message to be sent
        disableWebPagePreview - Optional - Disables link previews for links in this message
        replyToMessageId - Optional - If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
        customReplyKeyboard - Optional - Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for a custom reply keyboard, instructions to hide keyboard or to force a reply from the user.
        Returns:
        A TelegramRequest prepared to consume the sendMessage method
        Throws:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException - if any.
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException - if any.
        IOException - if any.
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest

      • createForwardMessageRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createForwardMessageRequest(int chatId,
                                          int fromChatId,
                                          int messageId)
        Creates a request to use the getMe method of the Telegram Bot api
        Parameters:
        chatId - Unique identifier for the message recipient — User or GroupChat id
        fromChatId - Unique identifier for the chat where the original message was sent — User or GroupChat id
        messageId - Unique message identifier
        Returns:
        A request to use the getMe method of the Telegram Bot api
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest

      • createSendPhotoRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createSendPhotoRequest(int chatId,
                                     File inputFile,
                                     String caption,
                                     Long replyToMessageId,
                                     CustomReplyKeyboard customReplyKeyboard)
                                              throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException,
                                                     org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException,
                                                     IOException
        Creates a request to use the sendPhoto method of the Telegram Bot api
        Parameters:
        chatId - Unique identifier for the message recipient — User or GroupChat id
        inputFile - Photo to upload
        caption - Optional - Photo caption (may also be used when resending photos by file_id).
        replyToMessageId - Optional - If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
        customReplyKeyboard - Optional - Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for a custom reply keyboard, instructions to hide keyboard or to force a reply from the user.
        Returns:
        A request to use the sendPhoto method of the Telegram Bot api
        Throws:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException - if any.
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException - if any.
        IOException - if any.
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest

      • createSendPhotoRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createSendPhotoRequest(int chatId,
                                     String photoId,
                                     String caption,
                                     Long replyToMessageId,
                                     CustomReplyKeyboard customReplyKeyboard)
                                              throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException,
                                                     org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException,
                                                     IOException
        Creates a request to use the sendPhoto method of the Telegram Bot api
        Parameters:
        chatId - Unique identifier for the message recipient — User or GroupChat id
        photoId - Re-send a photo that is already on the Telegram servers
        caption - Optional - Photo caption (may also be used when resending photos by file_id).
        replyToMessageId - Optional - If the message is a reply, ID of the original message
        customReplyKeyboard - Optional - Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for a custom reply keyboard, instructions to hide keyboard or to force a reply from the user.
        Returns:
        A request to use the sendPhoto method of the Telegram Bot api
        Throws:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException - if any.
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException - if any.
        IOException - if any.
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest

        longitude - Longitude of location
        replyToMessageId - Optional - If the message is a reply, ID of the original message

      • createSendChatActionRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createSendChatActionRequest(int chatId,
                                          BroadcastActionType broadcastActionType)
        Creates a telegram request ready to consume the sendChatAction request method of the Telegram Bot Api
        Parameters:
        chatId - Unique identifier for the message recipient — User or GroupChat id
        broadcastActionType - Type of action to broadcast. Choose one, depending on what the user is about to receive: typing for text messages, upload_photo for photos, record_video or upload_video for videos, record_audio or upload_audio for audio files, upload_document for general files, find_location for location data.
        Returns:
        A telegram request ready to consume the sendChatAction request method of the Telegram Bot Api
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest

      • createGetUserProfilePhotosRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createGetUserProfilePhotosRequest(int userId,
                                                Integer offset,
                                                Integer limit)
        Creates a telegram request ready to consume the getUserProfilePhotos request method of the Telegram Bot Api
        Parameters:
        userId - Unique identifier of the target user
        offset - Sequential number of the first photo to be returned. By default, all photos are returned.
        limit - Limits the number of photos to be retrieved. Values between 1—100 are accepted. Defaults to 100.
        Returns:
        A telegram request ready to consume the getUserProfilePhotos request method of the Telegram Bot Api
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest

      • createGetUpdatesRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createGetUpdatesRequest(Long offset,
                                      Long limit,
                                      Long timeout)
        Creates a telegram request ready to consume the getUpdates request method of the Telegram Bot Api
        Parameters:
        offset - Optional - Identifier of the first update to be returned. Must be greater by one than the highest among the identifiers of previously received updates. By default, updates starting with the earliest unconfirmed update are returned. An update is considered confirmed as soon as getUpdates is called with an offset higher than its update_id.
        limit - Optional - Limits the number of updates to be retrieved. Values between 1—100 are accepted. Defaults to 100
        timeout - Optional - Timeout in seconds for long polling. Defaults to 0, i.e. usual short polling
        Returns:
        A telegram request ready to consume the getUpdates request method of the Telegram Bot Api
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest

      • createSetWebhookRequest

        public static TelegramRequest createSetWebhookRequest(String url)
        Creates a telegram request ready to consume the setWebhook request method of the Telegram Bot Api
        Parameters:
        url - HTTPS url to send updates to. Use an empty string to remove webhook integration
        Returns:
        A telegram request ready to consume the setWebhook request method of the Telegram Bot Api
        See Also:
        TelegramRequest
